text: Ernest Lloyd "Sonny" Hutchins (May 17, 1929 – November 21, 2005) was a stock car driver who raced in NASCAR's Grand National/Winston Cup Series from 1955 to 1974. He died in 2005. ==External links== *NASCAR career statistics at racing-reference.info Category:1929 births Category:2005 deaths Category:NASCAR drivers Category:Sportspeople from Richmond, Virginia Category:Racing drivers from Virginia
title: Sonny Hutchins
